title: Keir Starmer – 2021 Comments on the Defence Sector
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 6 April 2021.
content:
Prioritising British businesses through defence spending is not only investment in jobs, but in our communities, and a more secure economy.
